constituent: darning, thread, spiderman, virtuous, sheep, horns, mouth
koohiiStory1: After a day being virtuouos and keeping the city safe, Spiderman´s outfit is in need of some repair. Luckily, as he can shoot out threads darning is very easy for him to do.
koohiiStory2: Darning is too obscure a word for me, I prefer to just think of it as repair. And obviously, repairing someones broken cloth things is a virtuous thing to do, and you need thread to do it.
words:
繕う(つくろう): to mend, to repair, to fix, to patch up, to darn, to tidy up, to adjust, to trim
修繕(しゅうぜん): repair, mending
